tool_description: Creates various types of assessments including quizzes, tests, and assignments with automated scoring and feedback mechanisms.

assessment_type.description: Type of assessment: quiz, test, assignment, survey, peer_review

question_types.description: Types of questions: multiple_choice, true_false, short_answer, essay, matching

difficulty_distribution.description: Percentage distribution for easy, medium, hard questions (must sum to 100)

time_limit_minutes.description: Time limit in minutes (5-300), null for unlimited

immediate_feedback.description: Whether to show feedback immediately after each question

error_messages: Invalid question count: Must be between 1 and 50 questions.
Invalid difficulty distribution: Percentages must sum to exactly 100.
Invalid question types: Use multiple_choice, true_false, short_answer, essay, or matching.
Invalid time limit: Time limit must be between 5 and 300 minutes if specified.
Invalid attempts: Must allow between 1 and 5 attempts.
Invalid passing score: Must be between 50 and 100 percent.
usage: Provide assessment_title, assessment_type, module_id, question_count, question_types, and difficulty_distribution. Optionally set time_limit_minutes, attempts_allowed, randomize_questions, immediate_feedback, and passing_score.

assessment_id.description: Unique identifier for the created assessment

estimated_completion_time.description: Estimated time to complete in minutes

auto_gradable.description: Whether the assessment can be automatically graded

rubric_created.description: Whether a scoring rubric was generated
